oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt and envelope
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Receipt is addressed to Colonel Joseph Turner Cathey and dated February 10, 1863. Receipt reads "Dear Sir, We enclose your note due September 29, 1861 balance & int. for 99.45 with 55 cents listed in stamps & change." Envelope is addressed to Mr. J. Cathey at the Forks of Pigeon in Haywood County, NC. Envelope includes two 5 cent Confederate stamps and is canceled at Charleston, SC on February 11th.
